name: M4ZE
description: A 4D maze game with raycast graphics

scripts.release:win: npm run build && node node_modules\electron-packager\cli.js . M4ZE --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName=M4ZE

author: Logan Kearsley
